sent.orig: This is the pride of Shanghai, is the pride of Chinese, is the pride of China!
sent.trans: 这是上海的骄傲，是国人的骄傲，更是中国的骄傲！

sent.orig: Your pride is my pride, and susceptibilities are mine.
sent.trans: 你的骄傲便是我的骄傲，你的脆弱也是我的脆弱。

sent.orig: Poverty is an 15 acid that drips on pride until all pride is worn away.
sent.trans: 贫穷是一种酸液，一滴滴在销蚀人的自尊，直至自尊销蚀殆尽。

sent.orig: He knew them to have their share of pride, the dogged sullen pride of the peasant.
sent.trans: 他知道，她们也有她们的自尊心，那是农民的那种顽固不化的自尊心。

sent.orig: Asas we have achieved, for you This is the pride and pride.
sent.trans: 只要我们学有所成，对您来说这才是骄傲和自豪的。
